description: macOS notification hooks - 任务完成、权限请求和空闲等待时自动发送系统通知 + 提示音

hooks.command: afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Ping.aiff & osascript -e 'display notification "Claude 需要你的授权" with title "Claude Code"'
afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Blow.aiff & osascript -e 'display notification "Claude 正在等待你的输入" with title "Claude Code"'
afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Glass.aiff & osascript -e 'display notification "任务已完成，请查看结果" with title "Claude Code"'
